### Get-WebhookById
**Endpoint:** `GET /v1/api/store/{slug}/setting/webhook_subscription/$WebhookId`
**Verified:** 2026-01-11

**Request:**
```powershell
$response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://secure.yoprint.com/v1/api/store/$teamSlug/setting/webhook_subscription/$WebhookId" -Headers $headers -Method GET
```

**Response Structure:**
```json
 ID: Jmk6bzKDWr9G5y
```

**Notes:**     Name: Zapier

**Script:** [GET/Get-WebhookById.ps1](GET/Get-WebhookById.ps1)

### Get-AvailableIdentifier
**Endpoint:** `GET /v1/api/store/{slug}/available_identifier/$type`
**Verified:** 2026-01-11

**Request:**
```powershell
$response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://secure.yoprint.com/v1/api/store/$teamSlug/setting/running_number" -Headers $headers -Method GET
```

**Response Structure:**
```json
NEXT AVAILABLE IDENTIFIERS
```

**Notes:**   --------------------------------------------

**Script:** [GET/Get-AvailableIdentifier.ps1](GET/Get-AvailableIdentifier.ps1)
